Ramadan Iftar Project in collaboration with Qatar Charity
20  March,  2024
Participants from the Citizen Program and Jassem Bin Hamad Secondary School for Boys distributed food to workers in tents for Ramadan. This project allows participants to contribute to organizing and arranging Iftar meals and distributing them to fasting workers.
Several members of the Citizen Program participated in the Iftar Project in collaboration with Qatar Charity. The event included the members visiting The Quest amusement park, where they enjoyed their time together.
